resources.string:
Instructions: 
 1. Modularize the code and add proper comments 
 2. Fix the UI alignment in List Screen 
 3. Retrieve the id from push notification, search in db, get the detail information like name for that id and show in notification tray. 
 4. When user tap on the notification, show the information like id, name, etc., in detail screen. 
 5. Also allow user to update the information back to db while hitting Save button. 
 6. (Optional) Implement pull to refresh in list screen and item click to view the detail.
